name: Go To Gold – Chinese Puzzle
description:
Garry Golden is going to a new journey through Ancient China. There are a lot of gold in the Emperor's caches. You just need to guess their secrets. Go to Gold is the game with good traditions of brain-twisters. The only thing you need is your mind, only mind and nothing but your mind. Go ahead!

The control has become easier - just hold your finger on the place you need and Garry will follow there by himself.
The puzzles are more complicated but now there are tips for tasks/quests.
Now there are much more levels. And these are all exclusive to iOS only!

Drop us a line if you have any suggestions or questions.
Facebook: http://facebook.com/gotogoldgame
ВКонтакте: http://vk.com/gotogold
